definitions.title: adj.gent.,
definitions.body: always c. art., or pl., as subst., Kerethites, a name for Philistines or a part of them (perhaps = Cretans, cf. LXX Zep 2:5, Ez Eze 25:15; on Crete as orig. home of Philistines, v. [[כַּפְתּׂר]], [[פְּלִשְׁתִּי]]);—[[הַכְּרֵתִי]] = subst. coll.;—´[[נֶגֶב הַכּ]] 1Sa 30:14 (cf. Dr; LXX B Xolqei, LXXL Xorri A Xerhqei); of soldiers of David's guard, [[וְהַפְּלֵתִי]] ´[[הַכּ]] 2Sa 8:18 (rd. ´[[עַל־הַכּ]] Th We Dr al.) = 1Ch 18:17, 2Sa 15:18, 2Sa 20:7 + v:2Sa 20:23 Qr ( > Kt [[הכרי]]), 1Ki 1:38, 1Ki 1:44 (LXX Xeleqqei, Xereqqei, etc.); pl. [[כְּרֵתִים]] Ez Eze 25:16 (‖[[פְּלִשְׁתִּים]]; LXX. Krh=tav); [[גּוֹי כְּרֵתִים]] Zep 2:5 (LXX Krhtw=n; ‖[[ארץ]] [[פלשׁתים]]): in v:Zep 2:6 We rds. [[כֶּרֶת]] = Philistia (v. [[[כָרָה]]], sub I. [[כרה]]).
